input_args.text: 'Email Print Hillary Clinton got the shock of her life on Friday when the FBI reopened their investigation into her use of a personal email server during her time as Secretary of State. The investigation was reopened due to incriminating emails found on the server of Anthony Weiner, husband of Clinton’s top aide Huma Abedin. Days later, The Political Insider is reporting that the hacker group Anonymous has released a damning video exposing Abedin’s shady pass. The footage reveals Abedin’s extensive personal ties to the Muslim Brotherhood, and that her mother is a member of the group’s counterpart organization for women. When she began interning for Clinton at the age of 20, Abedin was also working for a Jihadist legal publication which endorsed Sharia law. In addition, Abedin’s family has links to Osama Bin Laden and Al Qaeda. Anonymous also released a video detailing Clinton’s own criminal past. \nIf you haven’t checked out and liked our Facebook page, please go here and do so. Leave a comment... '
